attributes.action: Increase the number of students eligible for funded transport to school
attributes.additional_details: An increase in funded transport will allow a greater number of children  to make a choice regarding which school they would like to attend, which would then not be limited based on their families financial situation. We believe that Government/Parliament will be able to help make the greatest change.
attributes.background: Invest more money into funding transport for state school students who come from lower income households.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want more students to be entitled to free school transport, but we're not sure exactly what changes you'd like the Government to make to current rules about eligibility for free school transport.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You can read who is currently entitled to free school transport here: https://www.gov.uk/free-school-transport
